title: Sea Shell Park
organiser: Miracle, Kiwi, Playworld, Omnigym, LifeTrail Design
blurb: Vibrant marine-themed playground in Pasir Ris.
description: Sea Shell Park is a vibrant marine-themed playground designed to bring waves of fun and imagination to Pasir Ris. Developed as part of the "Build A Playground" initiative, the park was created through the Pasir Ris community's participation. Students contributed by choosing the ethylene propylene diene monomer ( EPDM) flooring design, adding a personal and youthful touch to the space. In the middle of the playground is the Miracle Mega Tower, soaring two storeys above ground with slides at each deck. Children can climb to the top through several exciting routes, such as an Arch Climber, Vertical Climber, Net Climber, and a Diagonal Climbing Ladder shaped like a ship’s sail. Its flowing jellyfish-inspired contours capture the essence of the sea and invite children to immerse themselves in imaginative play while developing strength and coordination. Beside it lies the Sea Dragon structure supplied by Kiwi, a playful and dynamic feature that stretches across the playground. Children can climb, crawl and balance along its undulating body, each section offering unique play opportunities through bridges, slides, and climbing holds. Beneath the dragon’s head is a hidden tunnel waiting to be discovered, sparking curiosity and problem-solving. The entire structure encourages storytelling, creativity and a sense of adventure while nurturing motor skills and confidence. The surrounding play area includes thoughtfully designed elements that echo the coastal theme of Pasir Ris. A cluster of poles and Butterfly Steppers inspired by sea anemones and reef-like steppers promotes agility and imaginative movement. The Cozy Cocoon offers a quiet retreat, while the Standing See-Saw, Merry-Go-Round and Multi-Seat Rocker bring children together through laughter and shared play. Younger ones enjoy interactive play panels that engage their senses through touch and sound. Beyond play, the park also features OmniGym and LifeTrail fitness equipment, offering a safe and comprehensive outdoor fitness experience. Adjustable-weight machines for pull muscle group strength training deliver gym-quality workouts, while bodyweight stations for push-ups, pull-ups, and dips cater to different strength levels. By combining safety, fitness and fun, Sea Shell Park stands as a shining example of modern playground design that celebrates community involvement. The combination of inclusive play and fitness spaces creates an environment where families can stay active, connected and healthy together.
address_display: Along, Pasir Ris Central, Opposite MRT Station, Singapore 519639

title: Sea Shell Park at Pasir Ris
blurb: A vibrant marine-themed playground in Pasir Ris.
description: Sea Shell Park is a marine-themed playground designed to bring fun to Pasir Ris. Developed through community participation, students chose the EPDM flooring design. The Miracle Mega Tower has slides at each deck, accessible via various climbers. The Sea Dragon structure offers climbing, crawling, and balancing opportunities. A hidden tunnel sparks curiosity. The play area includes sea anemone-inspired poles, reef-like steppers, a Cozy Cocoon, and a Multi-Seat Rocker. Interactive play panels engage younger children. OmniGym and LifeTrail fitness equipment provide outdoor fitness. The park enhances cognitive growth through movement, imagination, and social interaction, building confidence and resilience.

title: Jacob Ballas Children's Garden
blurb: Explore nature at this amazing children's garden.
description: Jacob Ballas Children's Garden is designed to provide children with unique learning experiences through nature play. It features various themed areas like a water play area, a sand pit, and a treehouse, encouraging kids to explore and discover the wonders of the natural world. The garden aims to foster a love for nature and promote environmental awareness among children in a fun and engaging way. It offers interactive exhibits and educational programs that cater to different age groups, making it a perfect destination for families looking to spend quality time outdoors. The garden also includes a sensory garden where children can engage with plants through touch, smell, and sight, enhancing their sensory development. With its lush greenery and child-friendly design, Jacob Ballas Children's Garden provides a safe and stimulating environment for children to learn and play.

title: Sea Shell Park Playground Vision
blurb: Bring your playground vision to reality with us.
description: Contact us today and let's collaborate on something extraordinary! We are here to help you with your playground vision. Whether you have inquiries, need further details, or are prepared to begin your project, we're here for you. We can help you create the perfect playground for your needs. Our team of experts will work with you to design and build a playground that is safe, fun, and engaging for children of all ages. We use only the highest quality materials and construction techniques to ensure that your playground will last for years to come. Contact us today to learn more about our services.

title: Sea Shell Park Playground at Pasir Ris
blurb: Vibrant marine-themed playground in Pasir Ris.
description: Sea Shell Park is a marine-themed playground in Pasir Ris, designed with community input. It features a Miracle Mega Tower with slides and climbing routes, and a Sea Dragon structure for climbing and exploration. The park also includes sea anemone-inspired poles, Butterfly Steppers, a Cozy Cocoon, a Standing See-Saw, Merry-Go-Round, Multi-Seat Rocker, and interactive play panels. Fitness equipment is available for adults, creating an inclusive space for families to stay active and connected. The park encourages imaginative play, motor skill development, and a sense of adventure for children of all ages.

title: Sea Shell Park Aquatic Play
description: Sea Shell Park offers an aquatic play area designed for children to enjoy water-based activities. It provides a fun and engaging environment where kids can splash, play, and explore with water features. The park aims to create a safe and stimulating space for children to develop their motor skills and social interaction through water play. It is a great place for families to spend quality time together, enjoying the outdoors and the refreshing aquatic environment. The park includes various water elements such as sprinklers, fountains, and shallow pools, ensuring a delightful experience for young children. The design focuses on safety and accessibility, making it suitable for toddlers and young kids to have fun and stay active. The park is designed to encourage creativity and imagination, allowing children to create their own water adventures. The park is a great place for families to spend quality time together, enjoying the outdoors and the refreshing aquatic environment.

title: Sea Shell Park Playground
description: Sea Shell Park Playground is designed for children aged 2 to 12 years. It features equipment from manufacturers like Miracle, Kiwi, Playworld, Omnigym, and LifeTrail. The playground is expected to be completed in 2025, offering a new recreational space for kids to explore and enjoy physical activities. It provides a safe and engaging environment where children can develop their motor skills, social interaction, and creativity. The playground includes various play structures and elements that cater to different age groups and abilities, ensuring an inclusive play experience for all. With its innovative design and high-quality equipment, Sea Shell Park Playground aims to promote healthy lifestyles and create lasting memories for families and the community.
